particleLexeme: 1. Used before or after a verb to mean that the action is done by someone or something in a very bad way indeed-more so than all others you can compare it with. English = worst.
verbLexeme: 1. To be very bad indeed and more so than all the other things of its type you can compare it with. English = (be) worst.
nominalLexeme: 1. A thing which is very bad indeed and more so than all the other things of its type you can compare it with. English = the worst.
